snippet: After 22 years of being referred to as Baby Hope, the slain toddler can now be called by her name: Angelica.
abstract: Law enforcement officials confirm first name of slain toddler, known for 22 years as Baby Hope, as Angelica; identification provides long-hoped-for-jolt in investigation by detectives from New York City's cold case squad; child's body was found dumped in picnic cooler by the side of the road in Upper Manhattan in 1991.
lead_paragraph: After 22 years of being referred to as Baby Hope, the slain toddler can now be called by her name: Angelica.

headline.main: ‘Baby Hope’ Identified as Angelica, but Questions Remain
headline.print_headline: ‘Baby Hope’ Identified as Angelica, but Questions Remain
